name: The Wizards of Pong
description:
Controls:

Player 1:

WASD - movement

Spacebar - Use spells

Player 2:

Arrow keys - movement

Control - Use spells

Wizards duel each other in a game of pong, and are able to pick up spell books which gives the players spells to use to gain the upper hand.
Players have to strike the other side's glass barrier three times for the ball to be able to go through.

Fire breaks the glass barrier, earth gives a bigger pong paddle, ice gives a slow effect to the other side, and wind accelerates the ball. 

Game is played with two players, local co-op.

Made in May 2018.
